venue.name: Bond Bar at The Langham Hotel

item.description:
Please join me on Monday January 10th at 7:30pm at:
BOND restaurant, lounge
The Langham, Boston
250 Franklin Street
Boston, MA 02110
Tel: (617) 451-1900

The BOND is a great lounge with a wide/quality drink and food selection, and it looks wonderful. This location has parking in front of the hotel, Iâ€™ve never had an issue with parking. Its close to the Red Line (South Station), Blue and Green Lines (Government Center Station) and Blue Line (State Street Station). Please try to bring as many of your fellow conservatives, Libertarians, and small government types along.

Please feel free to contact me with any questions.

Paul Neydavood
Cell 646-584-4292
item.how_to_find_us: Thruman, John, and I look just like out pictures.
item.name: Boston Conservatives' Meetup at BOND Monday January 10th at 7:30pm
